file_content.text: Boss ship really big and fancy, not big like Slam salvage tug, but Slam not have anything fun like shields and huge space blaster!
Blizz not be bored for long time.
Just remember that this isn't a playground.
Respect my space.
Blizz know, Slam show Blizz lots of things about living on ship.
Guess you really lucked out by signing up with me.
Glad you're pleased.
Blizz like that new boss have lots of new things to show Blizz. Blizz already learn everything to know about salvaging.
Things start disappearing around here and you'll wish Vause's goons had caught you, got it?
Don't turn out to be a thief.
Blizz not take anything! Promise! Only stupid Jreely steal from friends.
Blizz going to miss old crew, especially Slam... Blizz wonder if old crew get by okay without Blizz.
Focus on your obligations to this crew.
Don't dwell on it.
Right! Boss see lots more danger.
I'm not used to delivering this sort of thing as bad news, but your friends didn't make it.
About that....
Slam and friends, didn't make it...? Oh, Blizz understand....
They're dead. Better you move on.
Forget them.
Slam and friends... gone?
This because they help Blizz, right? Why Jreely have to make trouble, get everybody hurt?
New boss and friends all Blizz have now. Blizz take good care of new friends. Promise!
Blizz going to miss old crew, especially Slam... Blizz wonder if old crew get by okay without Blizz.
Now that they've left the White Maw, they shouldn't have anything to worry about.
I'm sure they'll be fine.
Boss probably right.
They won't be the ones heading into the most dangerous places in the galaxy.
Worry about yourself.
Blizz not afraid, Blizz know how to take care of self.
Blizz think boss need Blizz more than old crew. Blizz not disappoint boss.
Boss? Blizz been thinking.
What's on your mind?
About?
Sounds like trouble to me.
Uh-oh.
No trouble! Blizz promise!
That'd be a first.
That's a laugh.
Hey! Blizz think lots! Boss just not like things Blizz think about, so boss not listen. Hmph.
Blizz thinking about serious things, like how Blizz get to where Blizz is now.
Blizz had rough time after all the bad things Jreely did, but Blizz glad Jreely did them.
You're glad that Jreely almost got you killed?
Why?
Hardship has a way of putting things in perspective.
It taught you something.
Blizz see what important now.
Uh-huh....
Whatever.
Blizz sad that Slam and crew not fortunate like Blizz, but things probably be worse if Jreely not make trouble.
Blizz think Slam and crew be stuck in White Maw or worse if Jreely not make trouble.
Blizz would not have met boss and friends or been all over space. Blizz like where Blizz be now.
Blizz think Blizz home.
Blizz glad to have things back. Stupid Jreely not treat them right.
Blizz almost get all Jreely stink out of robes, but it hard work. Blizz did get blaster back how Blizz like it though.
What's so special about this little gadget anyway?
Let me take a look at that.
Looks like you can finally put all this behind you.
Must feel good.
Yes, Blizz need to confront Jreely even if it not everything Blizz think it be.
Now that Blizz have things back, Blizz ready for anything.
That thing better shoot down starships.
Hope it was worth the trouble.
It not ship blaster, boss. Made for Blizz to carry, blast things much bigger than Blizz.
Have grip so Blizz can hold comfy, show power pack charge, lots of settings for Blizz to configure....
It's obviously something you put a lot of care into.
I see.
Boss understand, Blizz put lots of time in special things. Not work though, fun.
Pretty decent for homemade, but have you seen the Czerka 656?
It's okay, nothing special.
Non-standard conducting cell, pure Ord Ibanna tibanna. Glance sights with helmet feed. Heat dissipaters for overcharging. The works.
Oh yeah? Well....
You just described every blaster I own.
Sounds pretty ordinary.
Well, Blizz's have a grappling hook, so Blizz win.
Boss see big difference with Blizz now that Blizz's things working like Blizz like.
Blizz can't wait to show boss how good things work while hunting bounty!
Jreely going to get it now!
Boss! Hi, boss! Blizz back!
So I see.
Welcome back.
Blizz glad to be back. Blizz miss boss and friends.
Did you find Jreely?
How'd it go?
Yup! It easy, Blizz know lots about White Maw and have Mako map to help.
Okay, okay, pipe down.
Enough with the yelling.
Oh... Blizz sorry. Just excited to see boss and friends again and tell about trip.
Blizz sneak into White Maw camp, almost get caught once, but White Maw dumb. Blizz just act mean like Jreely, they not know difference.
Blizz find Jreely and make Jreely give Blizz back Blizz things. Jreely not scare Blizz now. Blizz beat Jreely up good for Slam too.
Settle in, we've still got a lot ahead of us.
Back to business then.
Okay! Blizz be ready, promise!
People should think twice about pushing you around now, right?
I'm proud of you.
Right! Blizz not scared of bullies, especially with boss around!
Now I'm sorry I wasn't there to see it.
Sounds like a riot.
Aww. It okay, Blizz can show boss how Blizz learn to beat people up from boss on next bounty!
Boss! Boss! Mako did it! Mako found Jreely! Bad man who took all Blizz's stuff!
What did Mako have to say?
Bring me up to speed.
She did, did she? Better do something nice for her.
That's good news.
Boss right, Blizz think of something nice to make Mako! Blizz so excited, hard to think!
Uh-huh....
Still don't care.
Mako give Blizz map that show Blizz where Jreely hiding with nasty pirates! Blizz sure Jreely have Blizz things there.
Boss let Blizz go take Blizz things back from Jreely? Blizz get things back in no time, promise!
I think we'll have things under control while you're gone.
That's fine.
Yay! Boss the best!
This sounds dangerous, Blizz.
You shouldn't go it alone.
Blizz not afraid, Blizz used to digging through dangerous places. Blizz also learn how to beat people up good from boss. Jreely not give Blizz trouble!
I'll be glad to have the peace and quiet.
Just go already.
Boss take break while Blizz gone?
Blizz be back soon. Bye-bye!
Boss! Boss! Blizz have surprise for boss, boss close eyes!
Go ahead, Blizz.
I guess I can play along.
No peeking...! Surprise!
Okay, I'm not looking. Promise.
For me? Nice!
Surprise!
Consider me sufficiently surprised.
Just hand it over.
Aww... well, okay.
Blizz make figure of boss out of sticky clay ball from Voss!
Blizz have hard time deciding what boss should wear, but think it turn out good. Boss like?
Blizz make boss new headband to wear inside helmet, keep hair from flying and head from getting zapped!
Blizz make it from necklace blue people give him, but necklace never work right anyway. Boss like?
I appreciate the gesture.
Thank you.
Boss happy? Blizz have hard time telling when boss excited.
This is great, Blizz. I'll be sure to show it off to everyone.
I love it.
Yay! Blizz knew it be worth time Blizz put into it!
Next time you want to surprise me, do something useful.
You must be joking.
But... Blizz spend long time making present perfect for boss....
Blizz been working hard when not helping boss. Blizz had lots of inventions White Maw took away.
Some things special, things Blizz can't make to be same as before. Jreely took Blizz special things to hurt Blizz. Big meanie.
What makes them irreplaceable?
Special how?
Special things Blizz have for long time, Blizz build from scratch and tweak for long time or things given to Blizz from clan.
Anything I can do?
Blizz thank boss for thought, but boss can't make either.
This stuff Jreely took, it's valuable?
Rare goods? Now I'm listening.
Yes! Very valuable, one of a kind. Blizz never see them again.
Oh, boss! Boss can bounty hunt Jreely for Blizz! Maybe then Blizz see special things again?
Just try not to get your hopes up, all right?
I can try.
Yay! Boss the best!
I've got a lot going on, Blizz.
I'll have to think about it.
Blizz not in rush!
When I track people down, I usually get paid.
I don't work for free.
Blizz not have credits, but Blizz think of something to give boss for helping Blizz!
Blizz try to make it easy for boss to help. Blizz ask Mako to help too!
Um, boss? Blizz have question about boss job.
Blizz pretty sure that boss not a pirate, but boss does beat up lots of people. Blizz confused about what boss does.
Some people don't appreciate my work. When they get in my way, they get hurt.
Just occupational hazards.
My job's pretty simple when it comes down to it.
It's not hard to explain.
You spend your whole life with your head in the sand?
You're so clueless.
I'm a bounty hunter. I track down individuals nobody else can find.
So boss find people in hard to reach places. Blizz think boss sound more like salvager than pirate.
That okay with Blizz, Blizz like being salvager better anyway.
Glad we're on the same page. Mostly.
That works.
That's one way of looking at it.
You're a hoot.
Blizz not understand?
Sometimes space things confuse Blizz, but Blizz smart, figure out lots eventually. Blizz old crew help Blizz understand many space things.
Don't compare me to your garbage-picking friends.
I actually work for a living.
Blizz friends not pick through garbage! Blizz and friends find lots of good parts on Hoth, some stuff better than boss ship parts! Hmph.
Blizz still miss salvaging with old crew. Blizz think about them lots.
Now Blizz never get to see Slam and friends again. All because of stupid Jreely Toomb....
Whining isn't gonna bring them back.
They're gone, get over it.
Boss right.... Blizz sorry.
Blizz probably never see Slam and friends again. All because of stupid Jreely Toomb....
The person who framed you for stealing.
You mentioned Jreely before.
Boss probably see Jreely when boss meet Slam. Jreely only other Jawa to come to space with Slam.
I thought Ayor was responsible for you getting chased off.
Who?
Three-eye droid-man old White Maw boss. Jreely tell droid-man Blizz stealing. Jreely and Blizz not really get along.
Jreely always pushing Blizz around and taking things because Jreely bigger. Not anymore though, not while boss around!
I find people for a living, Blizz, you'll see them again.
Don't fret.
Boss mean that...? Boss the best!
There anything I can do, Blizz?
I should make this up to you.
Boss already do lots for Blizz. Blizz be okay with boss, Blizz think.
Don't get any ideas about running off with them. You're mine now.
Remember who's your boss now.
Blizz not run away, Blizz pay back boss for helping Blizz. Promise!
Blizz ready to keep helping boss. Boss ready too?
Boss going to take Blizz to ship soon?
Boss? Blizz like it if boss take Blizz to have rest soon.
Blizz testing new belt to make Blizz hair not stick to robes. Boss want to watch?
Um, Blizz not want to bother boss while boss in bad mood. Blizz can wait.
Hi, boss!
Boss need Blizz help?
Blizz glad boss take Blizz along today.
Blizz not want boss mad at Blizz.
Blizz doing good job?
Boss tell Blizz if boss see good parts, okay?
Hey boss, why ground fuzzy some places?
Blizz sleepy, boss take nap now?
Nobody better than boss and Blizz!
Blizz stay close to boss, okay?
Want Blizz to zap bad guys?
Aww... Blizz forget snack....
Bad people better watch out for boss and Blizz!
Boss look! Blizz find a... a... thing!
Ooh, boss look! Boss! Shiny!
Blizz like boss's new game! Kaboom!
Blizz right behind boss!
Blizz glad boss taking Blizz along. Space air starting to make Blizz fuzzy headed.
